content: My interpretation from the call was that the current plan is to delay the bomb by 2 months, but we will release that at the same time as Paris release so people just have to download once.

author: potuz
content: Ha that shows how little I understand of governance. My understanding was that no decision was made at all, although the people opposed to defusing the bomb signaled they would be persuaded of this plan (2 months at the same time as Paris). I find reading these signals harder than flirting when I was a teenager

author: chris2_2_2
content: I vote for big obvious polls in meetings ğŸ˜‚ set the threshold at 66%. Would make things a lot easier for the community to understand.

author: timbeiko
content: The ambiguity is in large part because there is no actual EIP to make a decision about

author: timbeiko
content: It's hard to get more than soft-ish commitments given there is no actual proposition. I think we have a weak consensus that _if_ we delay the bomb, coupling it to Paris is ideal, and 2-4 months is the delay we'd go for
